page.title: 18A Day in the Life of a Child
page.content: Continued changed. The game is an exciting one and we are a little lucky to win by three-one. We all have a glass of orange and soon it is time to go home. I go home with my friend who lives two doors away from us. Wekeep our school kit on and play shots and goalkeepers until about five thirty. When I go home for my tea my Dad is already home and he asks me about the game. We have pork chops for tea and then I help my mum and sister to wash up. After that we all watch TV. My favourite programme is Top of the Pops. I go to bed at about nine and read my library Dandy and Beano comics until about nine thirty when my mum comes in to switch off my light.
